events.message: I received the blender yesterday but it seems to be broken. The blade mechanism does not spin at all, which makes it unusable.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect related to the blender's blade mechanism failing to function.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily Johnson for further assistance regarding the defective product.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. Sorry to hear about the issue with your blender. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please confirm if there is any visible damage to the product box or the blender itself, and if you have tried using any particular setting?
There is no external damage visible on the box or the blender. I’ve tried multiple speed settings but the blade does not move at all.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a replacement blender sent out immediately or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would like to go ahead with the replacement, please send a new blender as soon as possible and instructions for returning the faulty one.
A replacement order has been processed and shipment details with return instructions for the defective blender have been emailed to you.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement blender and that it is working well to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you for the prompt service!
Glad to hear that everything is working fine now. Closing this case. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback is valuable and helps us improve our services.
